document.title: Hot Topic: Liability Exposure of EMTs and Paramedics Not Subject to Governmental Tort Liability Limits
document.abstract: In a recent Tennessee Supreme Court case, the court found that local government emergency medical technicians (EMTs) and paramedics are excluded from the coverage of the Governmental Tort Liability Act (GTLA).
